title: Xi backs Putin against US, NATO on Ukraine; despots plan Olympic meeting
content:
1. Xi backs Putin against US, NATO on Ukraine; despots plan Olympic meeting  New York Post

localize.title: 習近平、ウクライナ問題で米・NATOに反発、専制君主の五輪会合計画も
习近平支持普京在乌克兰问题上反对美国和北约；暴君们计划举行奥运会议
